text:
Fantastic local professional bike shop!

text: STAFF WAS VERY HELPFUL AND KNOWLEDGEABLE WILL DEF BE BACK AGAIN.

name: Amy Crews
text: I have purchased two Trek bikes from Spinning Spoke. Every time I go in the store for something the employees are attentive and knowledgeable and really care that I have the best experience with my bikes. Highly recommend!

text: The staff is knowledgeable, kind, and eager to assist, all while not applying undue pressure. The store carries a good inventory of quality bikes and accessories. And they offer great advice for maintaining your bike, which is quite helpful for the novice cyclist like myself.

text: I have nothing but positive words about this business and it’s staff.  The best experience my husband and I could have had!! name: daniel butler
text:
James Bros....Well Done.  On a five point scale, you all earn a six.

After all these years, I thought it important to write down how wonderful these folks are and what an awesome bike shop they have.  The Auburn area is most fortunate to have this asset in our community.

I purchased my first mountain bike 5 years ago from James Bros when they were still located in the bank building.  Although a novice at the beginning, I was helped to find a bike that would meet my needs.  I was not oversold.  I was fitted both in terms of how I would ride, my budget and my overall enjoyment with the sport of trail / mountain biking.

Well three bikes later, two for my daughter and one more for me, and I am still extremely satisfied with everything the team does for me and my daughter.  I have upgraded to soft tails and happy I have done so.  James Bros does an excellent job of keeping my bike(s) operating safely.  I cannot stress the term "safely" enough.  If you have loose or worn out parts, you are putting your life in jeopardy on the trials in the area.  The staff at James Bros makes sure everything that goes out the door is ready to ride - safely.

Eddie and Raleigh offer sound, professional advice.  They do NOT try to sell you something you do not need.  They DO make sure what you ride is safe and enjoyable.  They listen to you.  Really listen.  They find price points and products to fit your needs.  James Bros does not sell "cheap" products.  They offer solid value for the money for quality bikes and service.  If you need something they do not have in stock, they will find it.  They will service it.  They will back it up every time.

One example of how they help.   I needed a locking device for my new soft tail.  Eddie could have easily sold me what was in stock or even ordered a cable set.  However, that is not really what I needed.  So, he  suggested going a big box building store - Lowes - get a long length of plastic coated cable, a good lock and make the custom cable I needed for transporting and storing the bike in my truck.  Problem solved.  And he did it knowing he could have sold me a short cable set that would NOT have met my needs.

Each time I stop by, I am greeted as if I were an old friend.  That is how they treat everyone.  I would like to think I am special.  Perhaps.  But they treat everyone as an old special friend.   There has been more than one time when I have arrived near closing time when the team went ahead, took the bike in, and had it serviced before the end of the next day.  Eddie even came in when the shop was technically closed to help me with a part that was misbehaving.

Overall, I want to make sure folks know James Bros is a well respected bike shop.  If you need something, they will find it and help you with it.  Regardless of your skill or budget, James Bros will work with and for you.
Thank you for many years of a happy biking.

Sincerely,
Danny Butler

text: Helpful staff, good rental selection, good shop swag to browse. I was around for one weekend day in January and was thankful for the shop. Chewacla is a gem to have in their backyard.

text: I highly recommend James Brothers Bikes in Auburn! Cameron and the owner Eddie were very knowledgeable and helpful. They weren't pushy like some places you go too. I will definitely buy from them again.

text: Favorite bike shop! Highly recommend! Buy from here...very professional.

name: Stephen Hayes
text:
Awesome shop.  I was visiting one weekend and my bike was in the shop but I wanted to ride Chewacla.  The staff was great - they set me up on a nice rental, told me all I needed to know about the trails and also had a good talk about some new bikes when I got back.  Great guys.  My rental was only for 6 hours but they treated it like I was buying the bike making sure it was setup perfectly for me in every aspect. That is quality service...

Also, the shop was very well stocked - especially considering it is in a smaller town. I'm impressed.

name: Philip Faris
text: A+, 5 star, absolutely fantastic bike shop! I was in Auburn for a bike race and needed a quick repair to keep my bike going through the weekend. I arrived at the shop about 30 minutes before they closed to get it fixed and the entire staff was open and willing to help me out. They made sure my bike was taken care of and fixed properly. A big shout out to Raleigh, one of the members on staff, for being extra helpful and making sure everything was taken care of. I highly recommend this bike shop!

text: Could not have found a better bike shop anywhere, staff was very helpful and not pushy in helping me find an outstanding bike for my grandson.

They even offer texting as an option for contact! Their technicians operate quickly and can offer incredible advice on what to ride and how to maintain your bike as you ride. There's plenty of room to park and it's easy to find from the road.

name: Bruno Ulrich
text: Been working with James Brothers Bike for over four years re maintenance on my two bikes.  I've never been disappointed in the quality of service, nor regarding their advise with respect to accessories. Danny and Amanda's integrity is above reproach.  I always feel welcomed, as has anyone I've ever seen enter the store.  I highly recommend customers visit their two stores; and, yes, staff at both the Auburn and Opelika make you feel just as welcomed as Amanda and Danny, and offer their advise with expertise be it road, travel, or mountain bikes.

name: Randall Plaisance
text: I usually have an idea of what I want - but Danny helps me figure it out exactly.  Then his crew makes everything fast and easy.  Quick set ups and quick high quality service.

Once I decided on a bike they got it ordered and ready to go quickly and when I picked it up all the accessories I had requested were already installed on the bike.  And I got the bike for a very fair price as well.  Highly recommend these guys.

name: Chris Cochrane
text:
WOW... I was looking for a great relationship out of a bike shop and, I finally found one!  It's hard to find that 'feel' that your business is appreciated. We're new to cycling and, it's a perfect way to exercise as I recover through paralysis and such. We live in Florida, but as Auburn grads, my wife and myself spend a lot of time in Auburn visiting my mother.  We decided to check it out and, we're very glad that we did! You won't be disappointed!

These guys HAVE to be commended on the personal service helping a handicapped man and his family. For instance, as I already mentioned being cycling newbies, we needed to find a car carrying method easy for us with my limitations and, find a specific trailer hitch/bike carrier that my wife can easily use without help.  A couple of phone calls later... the 'Hollywood Sport Rider' fit our needs perfectly and, showed up in two days! When we came-in to pick it up, they had ALREADY ASSEMBLED it for us!!  The thing is like a jigsaw puzzle! They didn't charge us to assemble it AND, the company is big on giving to the Active Duty a Military discount... I wish more American shops/stores/services etc., embrace the James Bros Bikes business model.  Thank you so much guys!  Can't wait until the next time! Cheers!

name: Shawn Wheeler
text: Very knowledgable and friendly, great products and good prices. Just bought my first 29'er from them and couldn't be happier, look forward to doing business with them again.

name: Keith Thompson
text: James Bros. is the best!  Awesome service and great people. I will always do my biking business with James Bros.

name: Noah Triplett
text: Nice shop, everybody was friendly and helpful.  All employees were very nice. Will make more purchases soon.

name: David Mackinnon
text: We stopped by this shop during our trip out of town from South Florida.  We were mountain biking in Chewacla Park for Memorial weekend.  We dealt with Danny James and the service and attention to detail was awesome.  We had a beginner without a bike with us and had to rent one,  normally the rentals would be for 24 hours but since they wouldn't be open the following day we would have needed to get the bike back to the shop before closing (4pm) Danny went out of his way to get our contact information and personally pick up the bike from us the following day so that our beginner could really get a good chance to enjoy the trails.  He also took the time to point out great trails and sites we should see before we depart.  When we got the bike he took the extra time to fit the bike to our rider and make sure the shocks and tires all had the correct pressures.  I've rented bikes from other shops and have yet seen anyone else take this extra time and effort.  Any time I'm in the area you can bet on me returning to this shop for my needs.

text: Do yourself a favor and drive a few extra hours to go rafting in Tennessee. This place disappointed before, during, and after the trip. A day before our trip, they called and asked to move us back an hour and to a different location- we understood and agreed. The next day, less than an hour and a half before we were supposed to leave, they called to push it back an hour again. We already had made plans for the whole day and told them that this wouldn’t work for us and eventually they agreed to leave it the same. When we got there we were going to take our own phones (knowing the risk) because we wanted family pictures. They assured us photos would be taken. The trip before and after us had photos taken but ours didn’t because the “camera’s battery died”. On top of it all, the Classic Trip was advertised as a 2 hour experience and took less than an hour to complete. Only positive of our trip was that our guide was great.

name: Renee Brown
text: OMG!!!! This was my first time rafting and it was AWESOME! I recommend it for everyone especially first time rafters. I will definitely return again and again.

name: John Annis
text: Great trip.  We shared a boat with a group of Girl Scouts and we all had a blast.  Ours was an early trip (0900) and the water flow was light, but still exciting.  Guru was a great guide and kept it fun throughout.  We thought about going back for another run with more water, but have others sights to see.

name: Chris Massey
text: This place was so much fun. First we did the Blue Heron Aerial Course then we went for the classic rafting trip with our guide, Private. He was very fun and informative and made the trip really memorable for us. Even when our boat accidentally flipped on the last rapid (which they informed us could happen because the water levels were so high)we all felt safe and had a blast!! Definitely would go out again with Private as our guide!

name: john allen
text: What a blast! As a group of 4 we started our day with zip lining at 9:30am then the classic rafting trip at 1pm. I would highly recommend the guide named Waffles for the rafting. He is very funny and has good knowledge of the history of the river/town. We enjoyed the rafting so much we booked the 5pm carnage trip the same day. Awesome experience and we'll worth the money.

name: Kaitlyn Rose
text: Great experience with Whitewater Express! We had the pleasure of having “Private” as our guide during our trip. Fun experience for the whole family. Make sure to check them out and ask for Private!! Highly recommend. We will definitely be coming back again soon!

name: john allen
text: What a blast! As a group of 4 we started our day with zip lining at 9:30am then the classic rafting trip at 1pm. I would highly recommend the guide named Waffles for the rafting. He is very funny and has good knowledge of the history of the river/town. We enjoyed the rafting so much we booked the 5pm carnage trip the same day. Awesome experience and we'll worth the money.

name: LaShun Teboh
text: Great experience!! Professional and we'll organized

name: John Annis
text: Great trip.  We shared a boat with a group of Girl Scouts and we all had a blast.  Ours was an early trip (0900) and the water flow was light, but still exciting.  Guru was a great guide and kept it fun throughout.  We thought about going back for another run with more water, but have others sights to see.

name: Kaitlyn Rose
text: Great experience with Whitewater Express! We had the pleasure of having “Private” as our guide during our trip. Fun experience for the whole family. Make sure to check them out and ask for Private!! Highly recommend. We will definitely be coming back again soon!

name: Alyson Feezor
text: Whitewater Express offers a variety of activities in the downtown Columbus area from zip lining to white water rafting at a very reasonable price. They also have a nice store front with an abundance of outdoor gear/apparel.  I have done the whitewater rafting “challenge trip” 3 times and it is awesome! Perfect for thrill seekers as the Chattahoochee River is very large and contains up to Class 5 rapids. The guides are well versed and professional and I’ve had a blast on each trip. They are great at keeping it exciting for return customers and also make it a welcoming experience for newcomers. The trip is a short van ride 2.5 miles up stream and ends back in the downtown area. Definitely worth checking out if you are near the Columbus/Phoenix City area!

name: David Brooks
text: If you want a great whitewater day trip between Montgomery and Atlanta Whitewater Express in Columbus is for you. GREAT EXPERIENCE with professional, helpful and friendly staff. We did the 2 hour "classic float" which was tons of fun. Enough excitement without beating you up. Our guide (Monday as in day of week) really made the trip fun. He first made everyone comfortable and provided lots of stories on local history, the river, Indian lore, etc.. Highly recommend Whitewater Express for fun day on the river and strongly suggest you ask for Monday as your guide. Really great guy. As FYI, Whitewater Express is open all year and provides wet suits if you want in cool weather. They also provide dressing rooms with lockers and clean showers. HIGHLY RECOMMEND !!!   FUN !!

name: Lara Temple
text: Thumbs up! Such a relaxing way to cool down on a hot day! Great for all ages. My Guide was Scooby-Doo and his handy dandy tennis ball all his corny jokes 🤣 made for a great rapids ride... Will be back again!!!

name: Angela Turbeville
text: Was great! Ready to go back! Our guide was great! 4 of the people that went with us it was their first time and they all loved it. Thanks to Joe our guide!

name: Elaine Willis
text: This is an excellent introduction to write water rafting. It's not too strenuous and there are exciting sections interspersed with least bits.

name: Rose Munoz
text:
Pros: My family and I did the Challenge trip. It was our first time whitewater rafting. We had a great time. Hudson was our guide he was fun, informative, and experienced. Directed us well. The trip was exciting and a great adventure for us. The level 5 rapid was a blast. We flipped out of the boat because another boat (empty) was stuck in the Rapids at that point. Wish they had a way to remove stuck boats so that others parties aren't encumbered by them.

Cons: No mask worn in the store or packed van they could have at least opened a window.

name: randy hall
text: I would give a five star except the employees don't really interact with customers unless asked a question. Store is very well stocked, clean and organized. Lots of souvenirs and river activity related equipment. Clean restrooms and a shower area with lockers provided for your belongings while u are on the river

name: Steve Rechsteiner
text: Great trip and guide. Good rapids and fun swimming and wall jump into the river at the end. Shop and staff were top notch.

name: LaShun Teboh
text: Great experience!! Professional and we'll organized

name: Drew Hill
text:
So if you're looking for something fun to do in Columbus then this place definitely has it all. Whitewater rafting, kayak and bicycle rentals, plus a shop full of all the outdoor gear that you could need on or off the river. The staff was super friendly and helpful.
Sticker shock got me a bit. I had bought a used kayak off FB and needed a spray skirt. They had a price point for every budget. It seemed expensive, but was comparable to every online retailer. Plus they researched my kayak that I had bought and found out exactly what size I needed to fit my boat. Wasn't in stock, but ordered it for me.
They also told me about the weekly classes they offer in the river, as well as a class in the local pool to practice rolling. I'll be coming back here plenty it looks like.

name: Life as a Florida Boy
text: Super fun, before the dam let's more water out it's super calm but still a fun thrill but after the dam opens it gets crazy intense and fun

name: R A
text: We loved our trip and our guide Mango. Very enjoyable I just was the trip was longer and included more rapids-but those things are uncontrollable.

name: Jackson Baughman
text: Went on an amazing white water rafting trip with a group of great people. Our tour guide, waffles, was fantastic. Kept us entertained the whole time. He was super fun.

name: Amanda Tran
text: We did the Ziplining had an amazing exhilarating experience. I wanted to give an adventurous Christmas present to remember to end 2020 on positive vibes. The Boys were hesitant about it at first but were Champs and making plans to come back and share the experience with friends. I was concerned about the weather at first but when it wasour time the Sun came out made it even better such a beautiful place with the fall colors and leaves. The Boys enjoyed the challenge of the obstacle courses through the trees. We had an amazing time with the best instructors Emily, Reece and Katherine were extremely patient supportive and thoroughly great with instructions. The Boys said they definitely want to request them for our next visit. Also when weather gets warmer we are going to kayak and rafting too. Thanks to Daniel and Dan for their thoroughness explaining thebins and out and answering all my questions.

name: David Brooks
text: If you want a great whitewater day trip between Montgomery and Atlanta Whitewater Express in Columbus is for you. GREAT EXPERIENCE with professional, helpful and friendly staff. We did the 2 hour "classic float" which was tons of fun. Enough excitement without beating you up. Our guide (Monday as in day of week) really made the trip fun. He first made everyone comfortable and provided lots of stories on local history, the river, Indian lore, etc.. Highly recommend Whitewater Express for fun day on the river and strongly suggest you ask for Monday as your guide. Really great guy. As FYI, Whitewater Express is open all year and provides wet suits if you want in cool weather. They also provide dressing rooms with lockers and clean showers. HIGHLY RECOMMEND !!!   FUN !!

name: Alicia Collins
text: Great experience inspite of some of their normal activities being down. Sunshine, our tour guide was informative and very entertaining! I would definitely come back!!

name: Tessa Dow
text: Awesome adventure. Zip-Line across across the Chattahoochee River from Georgia to Alabama. The staff was knowledgeable, friendly & fun.

name: V Santos
text: This was SO FUN! I took my daughter (10 years old) and we had the best time! We're still talking about it! It's a memory maker, for sure. The guides were just awesome. So funny and very professional. I trusted them and enjoyed their company. The quality of the trip was amazing and I thought it was a good value, too. We will definitely be back!

name: Chris Baird
text: Always have had an awesome guide!! Pushed us thru to make sure we got the best experience we could! A+++

name: Rick L.
text: Awesome  place to go white water rafting  highly  recommended!

name: Tanya Hill
text: Our guide Horseshoe was awesome! He made the experience much better!

name: Shanna Harris
text: Booked a reservation days in advance to only get notified an hour before our reservation that their insurance has lapsed. If you know this when you first come to work notify people with reservations in advance so we can make the decision to wait it out, reschedule, or accept a refund. An hour before doesn't fly with me, not professional. Could have called this morning so ai could have planned something with my day instead of waiting on my reservation time but now it's cancelled. And then all the lady on the phone can say is sorry. Sorry doesn't fix it.

name: Kenny Schuman
text: Super fun!  Great guides!  We had an awesome group!  Thank you!

name: Andres Bolivar
text: Super friendly staff, very knowledgeable guides. Mango was our guide she was awesome and super fun 10/10

name: BCIS YOUTH
text: Absolutely an awesome trip. We took the blue heron ziplining adventure and the challenge rafting trip with our youth group and had an absolute blast. All of our rafting guides were entertaining and knew what they were doing. And the zipline instructors were excellent and encouraging. We will definitely be going back.

name: Taylor Rose Chafin
text: This was our first time white water rafting and it was so much fun! Danny was an awesome tour guide!! Definitely recommend!

name: Ren H
text: I tried white water rafting for the 1st time in my life yesterday and it was an awesome experience! Our guide was Monday and he was superior! He definitely has a sense of humor and had us laughing quite often. But he is very smart and was sharing his knowledge of what nature has taught him, which I liked. He said a couple of things that stuck with me, so I definitely will recommend him! We actually had to rescue a girl who fell from another raft and he made sure we was expeditious with it. I definitely plan on revisiting.

name: Ethan Smith
text: Amazing rapid runs. Great guides. Best time is 5pm for wild rivers and rapids

name: Matt Adams
text: We had the best guide! B MAC was outstanding! He did a awesome job catering to my daughters and their friends who joined us. We had four young girls with us (two were 12 years old and two were 14 years old). At first the girls were very worried that they would be hurt. After seeing others in the boat fall out and also experience “surfing”, they were ok. The last set of rapids caused our boat to flip! The girls thought it was the funnest thing they had ever done! We could not have been happier with our guide, B Mac! If we had to do it again, we would request that he guided us again. He was the best! You will enjoy this trip if you do it!

name: Thomas V
text: This was fun and guides were very nice and competent.  They didn’t actually provide the free fall that was advertised, though.  Also, they post a sign that they won’t comply with any mask mandate (but their aren’t any in effect, so this is just politicking I could do without on my vacation). Weird position to take for a sport that relies on teamwork and redundant safety precautions.

name: Ken Sam
text: They lie about the time. The 2 hr trip is  really only about 35 to 40 minutes. It was fun & beautiful.

name: Regina Dockett
text: Very family friendly experience, especially for first timers.

name: Riza Daniel
text: It was our first time rafting but we did the Challenge Tour. Our guide Hudson was Awesomesauce. He was funny, informative, and just all around chill. He made us laugh 😅 quite a bit and even though the toughest rapid beat us (meaning we flipped) Hudson was calm. The other guide Harris had his team help us out, so thank you Harris. Hudson made it so fun that even though we flipped he explained why and we still wanted to do more becauseeven that part was fun 😆🤣.  We didn't have even speed to hit that level 5 rapid 1200 cfps the biggest rapid in SE US. We did the level 4 twice. We are definitely coming back and having Hudson help us beat that level 5. Hudson again Thank You also Harris. It was a great experience and we will define coming back!!!

name: Nick Lewis
text: Never a dull moment ziplining and going through the obstacle courses here. Secretly I was there for the ranger jump but was disappointed to find out they no longer have it. Still had tons of fun with the kiddo on his 17th birthday.

name: Kristina _55
text: We had so much fun zip-lining with whitewater express! The price is reasonable and the view was amazing. The instructors were super nice and competent. The only thing we were not happy with was that there was no social distancing going on and no masks required. We should’ve called beforehand to clarify, I just assumed that there would be some sort of measurements in place to keep everyone safe. Other than that everything was great and I highly recommend this place. I also read that this is the only place in the US that offers zip-lining between two states, so it’s definitely a one of a kind experience.

name: Gary Stogner
text: Great fun and a must do activity in Columbus. We thoroughly enjoyed our first whitewater trip and will do it again. Perfect for first timers ( take the classic trip) or for more experienced rafters, go later in the day for the Challenger when the dam releases more water. Tall Bird did a great job as our guide. After we finished our trip, we walked to a restaurant for dinner and toasted our trip.

name: Prettygirl_ Raniyah
text: Me and my family went rafting today. Croc was our guide and he was great! He was knowledgeable about his job, funny, and he made the trip easy for our kids. I’m coming back soon and hope that Croc will be our guide. Everyone that we cane into contact with was great. It was an overall great experience. Thank you Croc and the Columbus staff. You guys are awesome.

name: Gordon Cox
text: This was so close to a five star. The irresponsible social distancing and mask wearing is the only negative. Regardless of your political beliefs you are running a business during a pandemic. The only responsible thing to do is to have process in place to keep everyone comfortable. People are coming here as your activities lend themselves to safe outdoor fun. Don’t impose your ideas of whats safe or not on your customers. This was a lot of fun and the only reason I gave three stars is because the lack of professionalism and consideration for the safety of the guests during a pandemic. Better safe then sorry guys.

name: Jacob Snyder
text: This trip was amazing. Our guide Danny was the best we could ask for. He was very friendly and did everything he could to ensure we had a great time. We have a family with all ages and all enjoyed the challenge trip. I highly recommend this trip for anyone thinking about going.

name: Bryan Trochessett
text: Our guide Harris made the trip perfect for my 15, 12, and 10 year old and myself.  Just enough excitement to get some great memories and photos, and just comfortable enough that all my kids had a blast at all times.  Thank you!  I can't wait to come back.

name: Jake Helms
text: This was our first time trying anything like this. Staff mad us feel immediately conformable and safe on the river. Total package was cheaper than expected which was a great surprise. Did the classic trip on Saturday followed by the challenge trip Sunday and it was less than $100 per person. We had such an amazing time with Doc on day one we requested him again for the second trip and he did not dissapoint. SOME of us will definitely be back for the carnage trip!

name: JOHN e BOB
text: The staff was great. Well worth it

name: Nicole Nishimoto
text: I highly recommend going for the day! I had the best zip lining and rafting experience here. Everyone there is so friendly especially our guide, "Squid." If you want the experience of a lifetime, you need to go here!

name: Glen Page
text: Great time on the river. The staff was super nice and funny. Equipment was up to date and plenty to go around. We did the classic trip. That lasted about two hours. After that we enjoyed seeing Columbus Georgia

name: David “DR-J1980”
text: Amazing time, took my kid and niece zip lining, had a blast, price wasn't as expensive as I thought it would be, can't remember thier names but our "guides" were AMAZING, wanted to do alot more but it was a bit cold to do the white water rafting.....came all the way from the St. Louis area and will definitely zip line again when we come back!!!

name: Paul Howell
text: Zip line tour was a fun experience.  Tree top and ropes course were good too but to a lesser extent.  Overall the price was great the guides were fun, even though one was barely awake, and it was a fun time.  Speaking of time it says 4 hours to do everything but if you are like us and the only people there then expect 45 minutes to an hour.

name: Bob Hall
text: Great company.  I highly recommend them.

name: Irene Calvache
text: This was such an amazingly fun experience! Everyone there is really funny and well informed. We absolutely LOVED our instructor, Granger. The Granger rapids are where it's at, y'all! Definitely worth every cent, and we plan on making this a yearly regular now. Thanks so much again, Granger!

name: Michael Curphey
text: An absolutely stellar experience! A great introduction to whitewater for beginners. Granger (or is it Grainger?), our guide, was charismatic, humorous, and knowledgeable. Great location, great prices, and an all around great time. We'll definitely return.

name: Courtney Branscome
text: We had an amazing time.  Already planning our next trip.

name: Robert Auzenne
text: Easy access to Chattahoochee River. Guided tours and knowledgable staff. Had a great time in Columbus.

name: Julie
text: Family enjoyed zip lining and gorgeous weather!

name: Danielle Dyer
text: Went white water rafting with my husband for the first time and it was a great experience. We had Sunshine for our tour guide which I’m sure helped the experience. He was personable and knowledgeable. I would recommend asking for him for your tour.

name: Melisa Curtis
text: We had a great time!  Mango did a good job of making sure we were at the bottom of the rapid when we got dumped out of the boat😂😂. Would definitely do it again!

name: Jess
text: Pork chop was the way to go!! If you go rafting ask for him as your guide. We had a love of fun exploring the river with him. The whole process of this establishment is super easy and laid out well. The zip lines were fun and I would suggest getting the bigger package. Once you make the first leap out of the birds nest you will wish you had more than the Osprey. Overall our group had a blast. I would suggest a water bottle that has some sort of clipping device for the zip lines, Georgia/bama heat + stairs.

name: FerraClaw FC
text: Great friendly staff and clean place

name: Shauniece Cornelius
text: We had a party of 5 adults and did the classic trip with Lydia as our instructor. She was hilarious, very professional, engaging and gave us a lot of fun facts along our tour. It was very informative and she did a great job. That was our first time rafting and we will be doing it again. I will say that they could be a bit better about COVID-19 safety. There wasn’t any social distancing, no face masks required inside the building or during the bus ride (all windows down). The life vest and helmet also had an odor that we did not enjoy. Overall, it was a fun experience and I would go again.

name: Joshua Anderson
text: Mason was an excellent and experienced guide! He demonstrated expertise and enthusiasm on the river. He put my wife at ease, who was apprehensive about the trip. No one in our raft fell out. This is my second trip on the Chattahoochee and I look forward to returning. We highly recommend Mason as a guide.

name: Dave Kowalewski
text:
Great time! Well worth the $50, Our River guide "Monday" was very knowledgeable of the history of the river. If you you go try to request him as your guide
A++service

name: tyler evans
text: Let's talk about Sunshine for a minute: this dude was professional without being boringly corporate. he also managed to keep us all focused and laughing in an activity we've never done before that lessened anxiety. Will definitely be back just for him. The rest of the staff was amazing as well!

name: Shai Williams
text:
Definitely worth every penny! My 9 year old daughter and I did the zipline adventure along with the obstacle courses and we had a blast! There were a total of 6 or so ziplines that we rode.  A bit scary at first as someone who's hella scared of heights like myself  but nonetheless, it was a great way to conquer that fear. Our guides were very nice and the people in my group were super motivating. Oh and it's a great physical workout too!
Try it folks, you won't regret it!

name: A Fine
text: Great experience with Whitewater Express.  Literally every step was easy.  Online reservation, telephone question, check-in, locker, suiting up, bus to put in,  and then we met Leo.  He guided us in our Duckie to a fun, safe and wonderful experience.  10 stars for him.  Ask for Leo.  I might suggest renting a Go-Pro for the duckie, because it all happens so fast on the Chattahoochee, it might be a fun watch later.  Thank you Whitewater Express and Leo for a great Father's Day!

name: Greg Kersey
text: Amazing experience, had so much fun. Do not wear loafers.

name: GG Javi
text: Even though I feel it's dangerous it looks as safe as it's gonna get.

name: Patricia Krause
text: We had such a great time here last weekend. This was our first time trying whitewater rafting and this was the best experience we could have had. Great instructions, good equipment and our guide "Coldfeet" was entertaining and knowledgeable. You even get to float down a lazy river during the trip and meet your guide again a little further down the river. This was very relaxing and a fun afternoon. We will definitely do this again. Restaurants are nearby so you can have a bite to eat after your rafting experience. They also offer zip lining, but we did not try that, looked like fun though!

name: Justin Sandlin
text: During our challenge trip of whitewater rafting, the service was nothing shy of bliss perfection. Our river guide, Monday, was benevolent. His knowledge of the area,  personal connection, and extensive persistence was beyond my expectations! If you are looking for a fun whitewater rafting trip, you have found the place. To top this trip off, I advise you to request the premier guide, Monday, I promise you will not regret it.

name: Kayla Halstead
text: They have a sign in the door saying they can refuse service is someone has covid symptoms, yet another sign saying they don’t consent to the mask mandate. What hypocrites. Maybe you should care more about your staff and community during a global pandemic

name: Ethan Sommer
text: I didn't take a trip or purchase anything from this business, however my experience with them was excellent.  I kayaked the Chattahoochee for the first time this past Saturday and had no one to go with so, I asked one of their raft guides if I could follow and learn the line.  The beautiful young raft guide was highly skilled, very knowledgeable about river, and super helpful showing me a great route.  I wished I could have thanked her, but I got held up above wave shaper due to a close encounter with the raft.  By the time I had rolled up and made few runs through the last rapid all the rafts were long gone.  Thank you Whitewater Express!  I look forward to checking out one of your demo boats next time I pass through.

name: Amanda Geil
text: Had a great time, did carnage. Our guide knew what he was doing. Went through a class 3 rapids and a class 5 rapids and maybe some smaller ones. River was a bit busy. Had to paddle a bit, which is hard work, but the guide did most of the paddling. Did some surfing and for part of it went down a lazy like river on our backs. Staff were friendly, helpful. Check in was quick and efficient. No social distancing in the store and when getting gear though. Got my adrenaline up a little. River was so beautiful! The store is in the uptown area which is cute.

name: Erin O'Hara
text: Our group went this Saturday with 3 adults and 3 young guys (12, 11 and 9). Participated in the classic with our guide Cam. He was fantastic, pointed out all kinds of history, water levels, dunked one of the kids (he asked him to “Oreo” him). Very personable, reassuring and understanding for our 9 year old that was a little nervous. The gear was clean, restrooms were clean. Gift shop/supply has everything extra you could need. We will be back!

name: Virginia Acevedo
text: Amazingly fun especially with Squid as our guide

name: Jason Limpus
text: Had lots of fun . our guide Bup was great .

name: Stephanie Hart
text: Such a fun experience! This was our first time whitewater rafting and our guide, Granger was amazing! She explained exactly what to expect, was really funny, and helped us have the best day. Would definitely recommend!

name: Shawn Fowler
text: My 8 year old daughter and I had a blast on the ropes course on the Alabama side of the river. She's looking forward to being old enough to experience the rest. Must do while in Columbus and Phenix City.

name: Poppy Bass
text: We did the classic float and our guide was Granger. She was amazing ! She made the trip so fun for the kids, she even got the kids to put “war paint” on their face using a purple rock before we hit the biggest rapid. One kid fell out (not mine) and she got him back in pretty quick. It was mine and my ten year old daughter’s first time and I was nervous. We had a great time. I highly recommend using this company and if you get Granger as your guide you will have lots of fun. I’m also all about safety and Granger made sure all our gear was properly on before we left.

name: Jordan Wise
text:
BEANZ is fantastic!!!!! Request her she is amazing and the world does not deserve her lively spirit! The rafting trip is soooo fun and great for beginners. There are changing areas, showers, and lockers (for $3 rent) in the bathrooms.
The shop cute and has everything outdoorsy you could need. The selection is big and the prices are reasonable.
Things to remember show up on time and don't lose the grip on your paddle.

name: Janel Schreiver
text: Had a great time!  We had Crock as our guide,  he was knowledgeable about local history, funny and a great guide!  You can’t go wrong with this family outing.  The kids will have a blast!

name: Chelsea Dunn
text: Had such a fun time, the staff/guides were informative and kept the experience fun and exciting! Would definitely recommend!!

name: Kacie Grace
text:
Phenomenal experience! Our guide was Rich and we “rode the Richie express” all through level 1-3 tides.

It was an active way to see the chatahoochee River and a great morning workout.

Rich took us way down Yonder the chatahoochee. For 43$/person it was well worth the money.

name: Christine Lipscomb
text: Our group had a fantastic time on the river. We are from all around the country and visited Columbus while at Fort Benning's basic training graduation.  We had no idea what to expect. When approaching the downtown Columbus area to go whitewater rafting, one might be a little skeptical. The river can be very calm or high, fast, and thrilling depending on how much water Georgia power releases.  We chose the thrill, and the rapids were at about a 4. It is very very likely you will capsize if you choose the thrilling ride so be ready! Although 2 of us stayed on our raft, everyone else took a drink, including our guide,  Seaver. Ask for him!! He made our visit extra fun by donning a clown mask. Our pictures turned out great!!  Best of all-- above being able to keep our raft afloat during most of the turbulence-- his directions were decisive and clear yet he was friendly and patient.  The rafting only lasts about an hour so if you're looking for a memorable activity without a lot of production or hassle...this is it!!

name: John Waldrip
text: Lots of wet fun.

name: Danielle Mathews
text: Lydia was the best person to be our guide! She was respectful of what everyone wanted to do on if they wanted to fall in the water, swim, or surf the waves. She was hilarious and very knowledgeable about the history of the Chattahoochee.

name: Jason Sanders
text: Excellent experience. Guide was super helpful and entertaining. Made sure that we had a great time, while learning a little about the river and the local area.

name: braaaap450
text:
One of the best experiences iv ever had !!! Carnage trip !! Our Guide Luis “Dos” is awesome .. from his sense of humor to his knowledge and experience of the river !!! Top notch ... we Surfed CutBait C5 . On-site photographer captured pictures of a life time that will never be able to be duplicated ! We also did the zip line Tree top course at night !!!!
I highly recommend this adventure /company to anyone !!

name: R P.
text: Great experience! One of the best rapids in the East. Very knowledgeable guides and friendly. Guide named Monday is who you want as your guide.

name: Jesse Painter
text:
I had an incredible experience, the staff was very professional courteous and was all about helping the customer, I took the full day whitewater kayak instruction. My instructor was Tory who was great! He was professional, experienced, knowledgeable, and patient with me considering I had no whitewater experience. He made the experience even better by also introducing me to many other prominent kayakers and kayaking groups as well.

On a separate day I showed as they had just locked up the store for the day and I wish I could remember his name but he unlocked the door and helped me to find the perfect spray skirt for me, if I would have had my kayak he was completely willing to make sure it fit my kayak. However I didn't but he was experienced enough to already know which size I needed.

I highly recommend Whitewater Express.

name: Jeramy Bowie
text: Great Experience with one of the #1 Rated Rapids in the USA. Family friendly, but please keep off the island without a lifejacket! And parents, PLEASE keep kids safe. Great facility,  Professional Guides that know the river, and are very entertaining.

name: Sandra Drinkard
text: One of the BEST experiences ever! We will be returning with our 3 children. Our guide April beyond met any expectation, personable, friendly kept us safe, all together pleasant. Thank you Whitewater Express for providing this most memorable experience!

name: Jessica Behnken
text: My family and I had an amazing time! Our guide, Bret, was phenomenal. Our youngest is typically afraid of water, but he had fun and felt comfortable the whole time. We can't wait to come back!

name: Eric Hill
text: I've been several times, and have done every package. Every one offers fun things unique to the package. Awesome setup and guides. Try them all!

name: Michael Donahue
text: We came on a day the river was tanking. They still took us out in the rapids for a while and gave us a free pass to come back again because we didn’t get the full experience. The second time back was great. The reason for four stars is that some of the guides seemed inexperienced and the safety briefing was rushed and unclear.

name: LeAnna Jackson
text: Great staff. Family/kid friendly. The Classic was perfect for a 9yo & a first timer... and fun enough for a veteran rafter. Mango was a great guide!

name: Mike Mitchell
text: Great guide a lot of fun. It is our fourth time doing this and we love it.  Our guide Bacon really made the trip.

name: Shawn Jones
text: There were several us in my group that didn't know how to swim. But, DRAKE, our guide was AWESOME! He was very knowledgeable and made us feel like everything would be ok. His super energetic personality changed us from nervous to excited! I definitely will do this again. I hope I get Drake again!

name: Ashley McPeak
text: so much fun the guide Mayo was amazing and fun to talk to I would love to go again. Would go every weekend if I could fun friendly staff very safe experience I loved it fun for all ages. 10/10

name: Ahsan Shah
text: For someone who doesn’t like water, I had loads of fun on this trip. It wasn’t scary or difficult (If your group can be on sync with paddling). The current is pretty strong at times and some drops are unreal, but if you had a guide like April, you will have nothing but fun... until she yells Shark 🤣 10/10 definitely will be returning and will be requesting April.

name: Kris Monty09 (Krism09)
text: This was a wonderful experience, worth every dollar. Our tour guide mike was great. Wish we had enough time to do it again this trip.

name: Daisy Velez
text: Beautiful place for long walks, spend the day admiring the river views and they also have playgrounds for children.

name: LR CREATIONS LLC
text: This adventure is very risky, please be made aware that if anyone fall off of the raft, he or she will be on their own, at least until the water calms. The guides are trained to stay with the raft, period! Not recommended for non-swimmers as there is a possibility that you will be submerged in the rapids. Enjoy!

name: aniston harrison
text: me and my family had such a great time here! the staff was extremely nice! our tour guide (buck... i think thats his name) was extremely nice and handled different situations very well! for example, when a small green snake got in the boat he was very calm and made sure we were all safe! he was funny and very interactive!! when we hit a class four rapid, everyone fell out of the boat except me! he grabbed me before i fell out. he made sure that everyone was on the surface and they all got on the boat safely! we will definitely be coming back! i strongly recommend this place! :D (i just remembered that our tour guide had woodchuck shorts and a small woodchuck on his helmet but i can’t remember his name! just recommend buck or the woodchuck guy lol)

name: Chris Sellers
text: Our guide was Pork Chop and he was super nice and funny - even we we paddled out of sync and made him work harder! The rapids were so much fun. Worth every penny.

name: Barbara Daniels
text: Had a fun and exciting rafting trip to celebrate my grandson’s birthday. Had a great guide “ Tall Bird” who provided great history of the river and landscape around it!

name: Tyra Ellingson
text: Returned for a 2nd time to bring my dad for his 66th birthday day along with my 9 and 7 yr old. Justin and Dock were our tour guides. Great experience and exciting time even with me( mommy) falling out the raft. I saw my life flash before my eyes but Dock was there to save me and scoped me out the river. Thank you guys!! I will return again once  I get the water out my lungs!!! Dock and Justin are awesome!!!!!!

name: Angelique Moore
text: Great times here. Pretty legit obstacle course. Although water is needed about halfway. Either bring a camel back or ensure you're hydrated

name: B MCD
text: Top notch facility with a ligit storefront and really nice people. The equipment was really nice too.  Our guide was Tallbird.  He was hands down amazing.  He really knew his stuff and kept us right side up even through some really tough spots. Really fun and cool dude!  I would ask for him by name.  My only complaint is the trip was too short.

name: Emily Clarrey
text: Had the best experience here!  Unfortunately our tour classic trip got cut short because the current was so strong,  When we asked the manager about it he gave us a free pass to come back during the summer!  Their customer service is impeccable and I would recommend this fun trip to anybody visiting Columbus!

name: Mike Mitchell
text: Great guide a lot of fun. It is our fourth time doing this and we love it.  Our guide Bacon really made the trip.

name: aniston harrison
text: me and my family had such a great time here! the staff was extremely nice! our tour guide (buck... i think thats his name) was extremely nice and handled different situations very well! for example, when a small green snake got in the boat he was very calm and made sure we were all safe! he was funny and very interactive!! when we hit a class four rapid, everyone fell out of the boat except me! he grabbed me before i fell out. he made sure that everyone was on the surface and they all got on the boat safely! we will definitely be coming back! i strongly recommend this place! :D (i just remembered that our tour guide had woodchuck shorts and a small woodchuck on his helmet but i can’t remember his name! just recommend buck or the woodchuck guy lol)

name: Jarrod Ellis
text: Amazing trip and experience, fell off the raft twice, but it was all fun and games!! Well worth the money

name: Michael Horner
text: Great way to spend a day!

name: B MCD
text: Top notch facility with a ligit storefront and really nice people. The equipment was really nice too.  Our guide was Tallbird.  He was hands down amazing.  He really knew his stuff and kept us right side up even through some really tough spots. Really fun and cool dude!  I would ask for him by name.  My only complaint is the trip was too short.

name: Hartley Walker
text: We've rafted two time every and both times were here. After the first time we bought the season pass. Rich and Holden , our two guilds that have taken us down the river, were both amazing. And the ladies at the desk are very helpful and informative.

name: DooBetter Challenge
text: Awesome River Guide's.. willing to go the extra mile to keep everyone safe!

name: Tyra Ellingson
text: Returned for a 2nd time to bring my dad for his 66th birthday day along with my 9 and 7 yr old. Justin and Dock were our tour guides. Great experience and exciting time even with me( mommy) falling out the raft. I saw my life flash before my eyes but Dock was there to save me and scoped me out the river. Thank you guys!! I will return again once  I get the water out my lungs!!! Dock and Justin are awesome!!!!!!

name: Barbara Daniels
text: Had a fun and exciting rafting trip to celebrate my grandson’s birthday. Had a great guide “ Tall Bird” who provided great history of the river and landscape around it!

name: Rob Lacy
text: Great little shop with a wide variety of outdoor and whitewater supplies. I didn't have the opportunity to paddle the river, but they have a wide variety of trips that run throughout the winter.

name: Eric Piner
text: We had an amazing time!

name: Keicha Leatherwood
text: Awesome! Amazing time! Our tour guide Harris was the bomb.com bus driver was pumping the sounds! Going back next week!

name: Justine Smith
text: The trip was really fun and the staff was very accommodating and friendly, highly recommend!

name: Jennie Helms
text: Great trip! Took kids and had the best time! Would definitely do again!

name: Shawn Ray
text: Fun place to bring the family for a  Exciting and fun adventurous time. Everyone was very nice and helpful, And our boat guide was very nice her name was Erica. My only complaint would be that for the amount of money that we paid ($35 each) it was very short. 45 minutes short. Other then that, it was enjoyable for our whole group

name: Kirk Davies
text: Had a great day today! Everyone was very professional. Harris was a super guide. We thought the rafting trip was worth our money and we had a nice time looking around Columbus when we were finished.

name: Steph Shu
text: Wow!! What an awesome experience! Friendly staff, easy check-in process and our guide, Marcus, he was phenomenal! We will surely be back and we will recommend the heck out that place! Thanks for the memories, our kiddos could not stop talking about it!

name: Jennifer Austin
text: This was such a fun rafting trip! Mateo was an excellent guide. He worked with our family’s interests and kept the kids entertained throughout the rafting trip. My kids are still talking about this being the best part of our vacation. I highly recommend this rafting company and Mateo!

name: Jennifer Kelley
text: Oh my goodness. At first I was so scared-but it was the most fun!!!!!   Our youth group loved it!!!!! Will totally have to do it again!!!

name: Traci Adams
text: The kids had so much fun. I did not enjoy it as much because I was on vacation and there was a lot of heavy duty paddling envolved lol. Our guide was awesome and the experience really was amazing.

name: Marshall Gillette
text: So much fun!

name: Jen Mallinson
text: Matteo was our guide and was fabulous! He enlightened us with some history of Columbus, GA and the Chattanooga river. He told funny jokes and kept the kids entertained. He taught us how to work together as a team and made sure we had a great time! We highly recommend Whitewater Express and to ask for Matteo 😁

name: J Keys
text: Matteo was our guide and he was outstanding! He made the experience much more fun and exciting. While everyone else was hitting the rapids head on, Matteo had us spinning, going backwards and sideways just to make it more exciting. He was knowledgeable about the history and had us cracking up the entire time with his humor. Thanks Matteo!

name: Josh Malech
text: The white water rafting, while impressive for being man-made, was slightly underwhelming in distance. However what they lack in rafting time, they make up for in experience. The guides here are absolutely awesome and are true experts in their craft. It's definitely worth the trip! (don't expect to be rafting more than 2 hours)

name: Scott Johnson
text:
Well run,  Staff is great ,  the Guides are awesome

We were are able to run two types of trips (Classic and Challenge) on the same 2.5 mile stretch of river due to the dam-controlled release which occurs daily! ( We choose the classic as our friends were not dressed for the occasion.. (water)

Call ahead ....   Make reservations....  Bring sunscreen..... Extra towels  SO... dress accordingly, bring street clothes to change into after... GO early.... blah,  blah, blah

Columbus downtown has great after rafting food and its right there just a few hundred feet away.

Have fun

name: savageplayer2323
text: Me and my grandson went.  He did the Ranger jump, the zip lines and the aerial course.  He loved it and can't wait to go back. The heat of the day and the weight of the equipment is something that I didn't think about prior to the trip.  All in, it's a great memory for me and I crossed it off my bucket list.  He'll do this again but our next adventure will be the Whitewater Rafting.  This is something you have to try!

name: Antoine Moses
text: This was an awesome experience!  Our tour guide Adam was awesome!  He was fun and knowledgeable!  We got quite a few fun lies and some history while enjoying the site and rafting!  GO AND ASK FOR ADAM!

name: Travis Engram
text: Our guide Small Fry was awesome! Great trip down the hooch!

name: Jay Fredrickson
text: Great time rafting! Our guide was Granger and she made the trip fun and funny!

name: Stu Jones
text: First time rafting for us and they made it easy and enjoyable! Glad we chose this for our first rafting trip.

name: Nekol O'Bryant
text: We had the best time today! First time rafting the Chattahoochee River.  Lydia was our raft guide and she was AMAZING! We will be back.  Zip lining was fun also but rafting was the best.   Great store for merchandise.   We will be back and ask for Lydia.  She had a great knowledge of rafting and the river!!

name: Jarrod Ellis
text: Amazing trip and experience, fell off the raft twice, but it was all fun and games!! Well worth the money

name: Kevin Hall
text: Great time! Staff is on point and really make it enjoyable. All the Guides were awesome. Shout-out to Lydia though for being the best. Great time

name: John Glessner
text: This was our third trip down the Chattahoochee River. We brought a friend for their first experience. We had an awesome time despite the rain. Doc ws our guide. We found him to be personable, informative, funny and totally professional. His guidance and direction made us all feel safe and secure.We took the 5 pm Carnage tour which was challenging and exhilarating.I recommend this activity as a destination or if your passing through the area.

name: Orion Cherokee
text: My experience with white water rafting was amazing. My guide’s name was Monday and he literally made the experience worth while. He’s super funny and he calmed all nerves that I had. I 100% recommend that you request to raft with him. If so make sure to laugh at his dad jokes even if they aren’t funny. I loved this adventure and I’m bringing all my friends back so that they can experience this as well.

name: Pamela McDowell
text: Fun stuff! Look for a Groupon or other special to save a little money. It's not the wildest white water out there but it is fun. Make sure you have good water shoes with backs, not flip flops. Dress cool and comfortably. You will get soaked which is part of the fun. Just do it.

name: Duane Nicolette
text: Great experience with the zip line and the staff was soooooo professional!

name: Josh M
text: Whitewater Express is AMAZING! Our guide was Seth and he was great! Very knowledgeable about the river and also funny. Next time im in the area definitely going to try the 5pm rapids and  I'm asking for his as my guide. Thanks for the great time!

name: Amy Gordineer
text: Our guide was awesome! Mateo is great and very personable. Put everyone at ease and knew how to explain very well the objectives. A  Must do for a family or large group!

name: Be Happy
text: The trip, with tall bird, was great. He was excellent. If you go, ask for him. The rest is poor. The poor experience started by the difficulty calling in and continued with trying to confirm my reservation. The day of, the inside staff seems unhappy, the waiver process is incredibly odd, the safety speech is poor. It was hot and the bus has no ac. My daughter wanted a shirt and there were none in the store, when we asked, again an unhappy employee just said they don't have any. Lastly, while tall bird was great, it was the classic ride. Be ready to paddle. Between rapids the water moves SLOW, if at all

name: Nichole McNamar
text: We did the Classic and for our first time, it was awesome!!! I’m sure all of the guides are amazing but as a person with extreme anxiety, I feel I lucked up with Quinn! She’s the best...but hurry if you want her, she graduates this year! Good luck Quinn..this girl from a tiny town in South Ga will never forget her first Whitewater trip because of you!

name: Lane Musser
text: Croc is the best guide in my opinion

name: Kevin Johnson
text: Rafted this past weekend and had a ball! Our guide "Big Mike" was funny and really added to the trip. Never a dull moment!. Would recommend the experience to everyone.

name: Tiffany Sevigny
text:
This was my first time rafting the Chattahoochee & I enjoyed it! I wish our raft time was longer because this was the shortest raft I'd ever done, but Leo, our guide was really funny, knowledgeable & made the shirt trip down the river worth it! Will definitely come back before the season is over to steal his job & make better jokes.
Don't forget to tip your guide!

name: Phil Meyer
text: Good, clean and safe fun!   The Meyer Family will be back!

name: Julie Geisendorff
text: ColdFeet was the Best guide!! He gave us an outstanding experience!! We will return every year!!!!

name: Cyndi Braski
text: Our family loves the Whitewater Express adventures.  The rafting and the ziplines are always wholesome family times well spent. Making memories for our family is always great when we partake. The shop is full of cute stuff, the staff is friendly and great and the atmosphere is vibrant.  We recommend everyone from any age group take a trip!

name: Brian Lawson
text: Enjoyed myself immensely. Cory our guide was excellent. Gave 4 stars because the bathrooms and showers were out of order and there were only 4 rapids. Will definitely be doing again. Thank you for a memorable Father's Day.

name: aisatou Diallo
text: Omg Water Rafting was sooo fun!!!! The staff is really funny and it’s all great vibes At whitewater express. I literally can not wait to go back again for the third time 😂

name: Joya Coen
text: So much fun! Even our 7 yr old boys were able to go and had such a blast, our guide Matteo was a cool very down to earth funny dude made the trip even better, definitely go see Matteo if you're in the area!

name: Sarah J
text: We had an amazing time with our 2 daughters on the classic trip. Liam was the BEST and FUNNIEST guide!!! If you go, be sure to request him. You won't regret it. 😁

name: Craig S
text: Matteo was our guide we did the carnage trip. Well worth the money. I have been to Costa Rica and west Virginia for gauley season, this was the craziest rafting trip I ever had. Amazing adrenaline rush. I will definitely be back.

name: Narges Yehia
text: We absolutely enjoyed ourselves. For the price, we really wished the rafting lasted longer.

name: Boyd Williamson
text: Amazing fun. Wildly exceeded expectations.

name: Rusty Miller
text: Had a great time and I plan to go back again. Harris Bolton was our guide and he made the trip incredible.

name: Eliza Rabe
text: We did the classic trip and had fun! Next time we will do the challenge trip for sure! Our guide was Matteo and he made the trip much more fun! He was constantly making jokes and just an incredibly personable young man! If you are going to go, call ahead and request Matteo, he's the best! We also did the blue Heron. It was worth it! We got all of our passes on Groupon but if you buy them from White Water Express you can put that money towards season passes. Highly recommend both! We had a blast!!!

name: Desmond Harkness
text: Great fun and nice staff

name: Adrian Dawson
text: My first time rafting was AWESOME!!!  Harris was our guide and he was absolutely terrific!!!  Very knowledgeable and informative, and friendly.  I can't wait to go back!

name: Michael Horner
text: Great way to spend a day!

name: Tisha Brown
text: Oh my lambs! My son and his friends (13 and 14 year old boys) had a blast. This was our first time whitewater rafting and zip lining.  The instructors were fun, knowledgeable and made our experience wonderful.  I would recommend this for families, girls trip, reunions. The views are beautiful.

name: Frank Kay
text:
This was one of the best experiences  in my life, I would recommend this for anybody wanting a great outdoor activity. I sure want to thank Monday, what an awesome guide!!!
😲👍👍

name: Matt Mycko
text: Great whitewater rafting! The wait for those that arrived late had me feeling antsy but, it turned out to be a great trip. Ask for Teo if you want a wild and fun experience. Glad we were teamed up with him.

name: Christy Kucera
text: So much fun. A must do!

name: Dan Flenderson
text: Went here recently and our guide was terrible. She completely missed the first rapid which is 100 feet from the boat ramp, couldn’t “surf” any of the rapids, missed the island that everyone else stopped at, and just spun around in circles the whole time cause she didn’t know how to steer the raft. This guide had no business being out there. And when I brought this up to whitewater express they told “I hope you enjoyed your time at whitewater express, please leave a review online” so that’s what I’m doing. If you want to have a great rafting experience then skip Columbus and go to the Ocoee.

name: Adam Penland
text: I had never been whitewater rafting until before I went whitewater rafting at Whitewater Express. I went with my fraternity brothers on a weekend trip. They were able to accommodate all 30 members who went with us. All of the tour guides were amazing. We only had good things to say about the tour guides and their amazing skills of taking through the river. It was an amazing experience and we are planning to return here very soon.

name: Paul Foster
text: Great place to go for all rafting equipment and advice also you can rent from them .

name: Zachary Goodin
text: Went both ziplining and rafting here, great experiences with awesome guides. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a thrill!

name: Ron Pleasant
text: Lots of outdoor activity merchandise and options for either water and zip lines.  I went looking for disc golf discs.

name: Joy Racheal
text: It was scary at first but they really calmed me down and everything went smoothly. It was a great experience with great guides!

name: Candas Bennett
text: Dos was a fantastic guide!! The whole staff was friendly, the store was very cute, bathrooms and changing area was very clean!! I will be back

name: Staci J
text: Kids went with a grandparent. They had a lot of fun, even for teens! Cannot take much due to water. They did the white water rafting, and the water was higher than normal. They want to go again! You have to sign a waiver for rafting or the zip line, which is normal.

name: Hat Girl
text: This is a horrible company. Twice they have gone rafting the day after a CHILD fell into the water of chattahoochee river and continued business as normal before the kids were found and the parents had peace. Their moral  compass is so off I'd be ashamed to give them a dime of my money, which is why I never have and never will.

name: Moninya Mulder
text: Jordan was best guide. Controlled the raft to put distance between us and loud teenagers. Loved the river flow!

name: Wilmer Arciniegas
text: We arrived at 2:45 and signed a waiver. You then grab all your gear go through a quick training speech about 15 minutes, and you drive off in the buses to start your adventure. It was well organized, our group of 6 were in a boat to ourselves. Super fun times. Our guide Matteo was great, he made sure we all felt comfortable and made us laugh the entire time. He also gave us a history of Columbus. There are bathrooms and showers and a few lockers, a total of 3 showers and 2 bathrooms. I think they could probably use a bigger shower/bathroom/locker area. Inside they sell tea shirts, water proof shoes , water and some touristy stuff. They offer several levels , we took the classic trip and it was great for 1st time. We had a couple of fast currents but also plenty of tranquil waters. We got off the boat and floated down stream, it was extremely relaxing. Next time we will maybe step it up a bit. They also offer zip line which looked liked a lot of fun. We had a great time and the area is great to take a stroll and enjoy a gorgeous sunset. Great places to eat also. Highly recommend.

name: Maria Mejia
text: We had a great time even my husband in a wheelchair was able to get on the raft and all of us had an amazing experience

name: Mathew Crane
text: Did the Challenge White Water trip. It was awesome. Mitch, our guide, was on point. So much fun.

name: Always Busy
text: The actual experience of white water rafting was super fun. The staff was insightful, funny and definitely entertaining. The reason for the 2-stars is that over the course of our white water rafting experience our guide mentioned TIPS over 20 times. It honestly got very irritating and left us all feeling annoyed and kind of harassed. Begging for tips ain’t cool, but the experience was. You be the judge.

name: Tasia Golston
text: Great experience! The staff is a great group of young adults they work well together as a unit and are very supportive towards customers. I couldn't have asked for a better zip line/ aerial experience! I'll be returning!

name: Shannon Zieg
text: Great guides, and a fun ride.😊

name: Stacey ChambersGA
text: Had a blast with my daughter. Learned a few new history facts from our guide, cooled off in the Chattahoochee, and thoroughly enjoyed our Sunday fun day with other guest safely maneuvering the low water white waters on a thrilling, easy adventure.

name: Aaron Gable
text: Ran the Chattahoochee in Columbus . Fun short trip. Guides are great!  Private boat shuttle available  just make sure to check levels before you run goes from fun to real damn big in a hurry.

name: Lindsey Shemwell (The Budding Botanist)
text: Woody was our guide and he was awesome! We went at 11am but will definitely return for the 1pm or later run for stronger rapids!

name: Mark g
text: Guides were great and funny! Doesn't matter who you talk to on the phone because the owner will not back up his employees! Employee stated on the phone that they will honor Groupon in the store the day of but the Owner will not honor Groupon the day of! Not honorable in my book! I guess this is how people get ahead in business!

name: Lze Kelley
text: We had the best time, our guide was Carson !! He was AWESOME which made the trip that much more fun! Rapids was up and moving fast when we went on the 11AM trip. Enough to knock me out the boat for a little dive in the Chattahoochee River. Carson was right on it and pulled me back in the boat LIKE A CHAMP 💪.. We are already planning another trip !!!!

name: Larry Bouget
text: This was a great trip. Our guide was informative about the river. He demonstrated a high level of skill and delivered a fun and exciting rafting day on our vacation. We are indeed planning this trip again. Thanks!

name: Shelley Mast
text:
We had a blast!!! So much fun. I can't wait to go again. Our guide, Big John, was so sweet. The water was perfect. The weather was wonderful. The equipment was in great shape. Clean and unworn. The cashier was a bit cranky, but she might have been having a bad day. Who knows. They have changing rooms and nice clean showers too. I would say, if you want a midrange white water experience,  this is for you.

One small surprise. It's in the EASTERN time zone. We came from the CENTRAL time zone and didn't realize the time difference.

name: Blaine Brinkley
text: Harris was a fantastic guide. We enjoyed the rafting immensely!

name: Eric Hiben
text: Great value for the entertainment. We did the Classic trip with a family and it was fun and exciting without feeling too edgy.

name: Rocky Pierce
text: Our guide was Jake and he was very knowledgeable about the area, which was nice during the down times. Some very interesting stuff happened around this area. He also was very good and moving the raft around as it was needed. He called directions from the back of the raft and I can't recommend him enough. I enjoyed the rapids. This was our first time going white water rafting and we did the Challenger Trip. There were about 4 class 3-4 rapids the first time down. The guide would maneuver the raft back onto the rapids a few times after we passed. We then got back on the bus and did the trip again, but by this time the dam had been opened and it made the rapids different. Again there were about 3 or 4  class 3-4 rapids and right at the end there was an awesome class 5 rapid. The first time down took us 2 hours and the second time down was about 1 hour. The 2 times down were in the 1 trip. It was not 2 trips. I expected more rapids, but even still we had a great time and it was a lot of fun. I would do it again no questions asked.

name: Micah Moody
text: This place is a joke. When they say the trip is 2 hours they are referencing from when you park in their parking lot and get your life jacket and go through the briefing and drive to the river. The actual rafting felt like 45 minutes. And you only go down two rapids. To actually go down the second rapid we had to do a u turn in the river get out the raft and go down the rapid. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS PLACE!!!

name: Larry Bouget
text: This was a great trip. Our guide was informative about the river. He demonstrated a high level of skill and delivered a fun and exciting rafting day on our vacation. We are indeed planning this trip again. Thanks!

name: Rocky Pierce
text: Our guide was Jake and he was very knowledgeable about the area, which was nice during the down times. Some very interesting stuff happened around this area. He also was very good and moving the raft around as it was needed. He called directions from the back of the raft and I can't recommend him enough. I enjoyed the rapids. This was our first time going white water rafting and we did the Challenger Trip. There were about 4 class 3-4 rapids the first time down. The guide would maneuver the raft back onto the rapids a few times after we passed. We then got back on the bus and did the trip again, but by this time the dam had been opened and it made the rapids different. Again there were about 3 or 4  class 3-4 rapids and right at the end there was an awesome class 5 rapid. The first time down took us 2 hours and the second time down was about 1 hour. The 2 times down were in the 1 trip. It was not 2 trips. I expected more rapids, but even still we had a great time and it was a lot of fun. I would do it again no questions asked.

name: Eric Hiben
text: Great value for the entertainment. We did the Classic trip with a family and it was fun and exciting without feeling too edgy.

name: Kim Decker
text: Old Blue was our guide and he made it an amazing journey!

name: Blaine Brinkley
text: Harris was a fantastic guide. We enjoyed the rafting immensely!

name: Mackenzy Mahon
text: First time raffing ...had a great time ...will be back 💜 a special thanks to our awesome guide... Monday ....you were awesome..

name: Katrina Wambles
text: Tallbird was AWESOME!! We enjoyed the classic trip for our first time! It was perfect for my 2 nephews (14 and 12 years old) Can’t wait to go back for the next level and maybe even some fly fishing! Thank you again! And ask for Tallbird!

name: T. Haynes
text: It is a wonderful experience. The only dislike is that the helmets are not disinfected. There could also be thin caps available to avoid someone else's sweat being on your head.

name: Micah Moody
text: This place is a joke. When they say the trip is 2 hours they are referencing from when you park in their parking lot and get your life jacket and go through the briefing and drive to the river. The actual rafting felt like 45 minutes. And you only go down two rapids. To actually go down the second rapid we had to do a u turn in the river get out the raft and go down the rapid. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS PLACE!!!

name: Sara Rines
text: We rented bikes and experienced the advanced whitewater course. The biking trail was lovely, following the Chattahoochee river on the Georgia side all the way past Fort Benning. The whitewater trip was incredibly fun, the guides were hilarious and entertaining but still safe and hard working.

name: T. Haynes
text: It is a wonderful experience. The only dislike is that the helmets are not disinfected. There could also be thin caps available to avoid someone else's sweat being on your head.

name: Maria Evans
text: Great guide! Great ride! Our guide was enthusiastic and very informative. The staff is great and helpful and we loved the experience!

name: Kiara Cook
text:
Yesterday June 30 2019 a 6 year old boy slipped into the river and has yet to be found. Instead of clearing the river today and allowing search teams to look for him they continued to raft. Previously, I reviewed this company. I’ve been out with them twice and had a great time but this is unforgivable. Even if just for respect of an innocent life being taken there shouldn’t have been any rafting today.
I challenge you to imagine if it were your child! Imagine him your brother, nephew, or friend lost! And all the while people and playing, rafting, having a great time getting in the way!

name: Jose Romero
text: Really had a wonderful time at Whitewater Express. I brought a group of 20+ Boy Scouts to raft down the Chattahoochee and they had a blast. What made it special was the was they staff treated us. They were extremely knowledgeable and helpful. They showed they really cared and helped with our every need.

name: Angie Garcia
text: It was really fun and our guide, J-bar,  was really funny and cool so can’t complain about that but my family and I just felt gross the whole time. Like the raft was disgusting and there was a roach. The bathrooms were also absolutely disgusting and unsanitary. And I know this isn’t the place’s fault but the camera guy lost his camera in the river so we didn’t even get pictures. In all we had fun and our guide was awesome but the rest of the experience was “eh”.

name: Steven Haberkorn
text: My wife, niece,  daughter and I all went yesterday on the challenge run. You go down the river twice. We had Ian as our rafting guide. This guy made it a blast! It's been a while since I had so much fun. Be ready to swim and have fun!

name: Angel Williams
text: It was an amazing experience! My guide, Cameron, was wonderful! The water was relatively smooth, but the white waters were a level 3 or 4 for sure! I would do it again in a heart beat!

name: erica hyatt
text: Went on the whitewater rafting with Lidia as the guide & it was absolutely amazing. Will request her when we go again!!!

name: Shawn Cox
text: My husband and myself took our 21 and 22 years old and their girlfriend and boyfriend. We did the classic trip and had so much fun. Our guide was Carson and he was terrific!! We will definitely be doing the challenge trip next.the staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Michelle Lagace
text: Scooby was fantastic as always!!! ❤❤❤ you guys!!! See you next month!!!🥰

name: Clayton Gabriel Floyd
text: I had fun our guide was named lydia she was an amazing guide  was making us laugh cracking jokes she  and the hole boat sang for me on my birthday even though I didn't ask them to

name: Sarthak Kapoor
text: We went when the place was quite busy and full of rapids. Worth a go

name: Bill Rochelle
text:
An amazing experience with thrills and spills
Fonz was an excellent guide highly recommend him

name: Brad Baxter
text: Don't buy the High Adventure ticket. It's the same as a regular ticket. Best place to buy a ticket is Groupon

name: Madison Whitlam
text: Pippy was an awesome guide! We all had a great time, 10/10 would recommend

name: Erin Alexander
text: My sister and I took our boys, age 14 and 17 to do the Blue Heron Adventure.  We had the 2 best guides EVER!!  Jeremiah and Isaiah.  They made the obstacles so much fun!  We chose the 4 hour adventure, so we were able to go on the zip lines a second time!  Well worth every dollar we spent!  We will definitely be going back and asking for Jeremiah and Isaiah as our guides!  Do yourself a favor and zipline with this company!

name: Elijah Neundorfer
text: This place is incredible for adventure in the Columbus area, albeit a little on the pricy side. Offering both trips down the river in rafts and kayaks and trips over the river via their multi-state Zipline course, I highly recommend this for anyone looking for thrills and a fun outing.

name: Jeff Snyder
text: Had a blast on the 11am trip! Guide Harris was awesome!! Pretty tame ride...do later session if u want more action

name: Alex Kerbel
text: We had Nathan "cold feet" as a guide and he was super awesome! It was clear that he knew what he was doing, was hilarious and showed us a great time. Definitely would go back. :)

name: Matthew Green
text: Awesome Tony was cool 👍

name: Cathy Wilkes
