text: We had a blast on our rafting trip. Our guide, Tony, was very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. We plan on going again and inviting friends to join us.

name: Carlos Cardona
text: First time whitewater rafting was a success! My guide was very knowledgeable and passionate about what he was doing! Definitely going again with this company!

name: Cynthya Mendoza
text: Such an awesome experience!  Great way to enjoy as a group and work together!  Our guide Gator did such an amazing job. Very charismatic and with such positive, fun energy! Enjoyed every second of it!

name: Honky Kong
text: Amazing place. Everyone was super friendly except 1 female at the front desk (real pretty dark skin dark hair) she was a snob and acted like we were bothering her. So I just spoke to the lady next to her.  She was my only complaint.  Our guide BIG TUNA was awesome very knowledgeable  and fun to hang out with. Ask for Big Tuna and be prepared to tip because you'll love every sec of the time with him.

name: Alex Dodgen
text: These people are the most insensitive people known to man kind. After a little boy was taken under the rapids on Sunday evening and search and rescue was unable to locate him on Sunday it was declared a recovery missions and no longer a search and rescue mission. The integrity of this company has been completely exposed as there insensitive act of continuing to run the rapids as search and rescue were still out trying to recover this child and interfered with the efforts being put Ford by the individuals trying to recover the body of this child. These people should be ashamed and the company should be ashamed.....I hope the pennies you made today were worth it. I don’t recommend whitewater express to anyone locally or coming in from out of town after the horrible ethics displayed.

name: Sumgirluknow
text: It was a fun experience zip lining, the next time I'll do the obstacle course, it would have been even better if all of the staff was in a good mood, the girl that has "hashbrowns" on the back of her helmet was not very nice, didn't smile, wasn't friendly, didn't give any encouragement to my friend who was nervous. Some people don't need to work in fun environments if they don't know how to treat people or encourage them in situations where they may need it.

name: Olivia Longstreet
text: It is so much fun not dangerous at all they have very professional instructors that ride with you and tell you exactly what to do it is very safe and fun

name: Sheila Pham
text: We did the Full Adventure with zip lining, aerial course, and whitewater rafting (Challenge Trip!)! We had a FANTASTIC time, especially rafting with our awesome guide, Harris! Water was warm, we were always smiling and having a blast. No complaints here! If you go, ask for Harris! He'll make sure you will want to come back for more!

name: Cameron Hurt
text: Loved our tour guide (Matteo) would recommend to everyone

name: Marcus Strickland
text: Monday and Leo were great guides! Great time!

name: Diane Steele
text: Cool looking place. Has zip line. I believe there are instructional classes on water.

name: Chelsea Ricky
text: Awesome first time rafting experience, and our guide (Pat) was great! We did the early bird Classic, and I definitely want to work my way up to try the Challenge. The only thing keeping me from putting 5 stars is the customer service back at the actual shop. I know it gets crazy busy in the summer, but they seemed pretty disorganized and left customers waiting for awhile to make purchases. Lots of fun overall and highly recommended!

name: Peechis Thomas
text: My 1st experience with scheduling was AWFUL front desk employee named Kendell was rude and very unprofessional.. But I prayed about it and scheduled rafting trip. My family of 4 had the ride of our life. Pat our guide was VERY different in a good way.. Would highly recommend to family and friends.

name: Margaret Adams
text: Definitely a must if you visit Columbus. Was a great experience with such solid and trusting guides. Will be back for sure!

name: John Malmström
text: Went on a 4 hour kayaking course and I was a bit suprised that i was the only one there for the kayak course. The guide Daniel i had took me on a perfect course where he went trough the basics about whitewater paddling and the saftey on the river. I would recomend this company to anyone interested in whitewater paddling!

name: Alex Hdz
text:
This was our first time doing something as a family in a very long time.  Son was in town and we all decided on river rafting.   This was a complete blast and the most fun we have ever had as a family.  We all worked together as a team and had so many laughs from beginning to end.
Highly, highly recommend anyone visiting, or that is stationed here in Benning to spend a day.
BTW, ask for Matteia best guide to have.
Thank you for being our guide and making this trip the best, coming back to buy the season pass.

name: TEG JiantVanilla14 Lol nation
text: Very fun and well-guided rafting trip. We really enjoyed the experience.

name: Randy Hill
text: Awesome experience.....our guide was Monday....he did a great job!

name: Ericka Fitzpatrick
text: My first time rafting was amazing! Wonderful time!! Special thanks to our guide " ridge" for making our rafting experience memorable and fun! Pure Comedy on water lol

name: Jasmari Rodriguez
text: Crossing state lines while ziplining was an amazing experience. Will be back soon to experience river rafting.

name: Tammy Bunn
text: First time ice been and it won't b the last.. It was a blast.. Mateo you rock.. We will b back to see u..

name: Ryan Tyler
text: Kinda busy water lots of rafts and other guests. Very knowledgeable staff, created a safe fun environment. What they have done with the river is amazing and great for community. Multitiered levels throughout the day for all skill levels

name: Laurie Clark
text:
I just love the new zip line course but love the Staff more. They are so caring for being so young. My Son got over heated and they were so wonderful to him. Thank you all for your concerns for him.. You all ROCK.. You all will be forever in my heart and prayers..
The management should be proud of each of you..

name: Lyn Adams
text: We had a blast! We did the classic trip but the power company opened up the dam so the water was faster and higher than usual. Luckly we did not flip but we did help others that did. Everything was great and our guide "Jordan" did a great job in ensuring our safety and that we had fun. Will be doing it again soon...

name: Brad Ploeger
text: Looking to go white water rafting or zip lining at one of the most unique location on Earth?  Look no further.

name: Ashley Lawson
text: I went with 4 other girls for my bachelorette party and it was a BLAST!!! None of us had ever been zip lining or rafting before.  We did the package deal Zip line/Classic river trip!  The Zip lines were a great way to start the day, get our adrenalin pumping.  Our Guide Jodi took us down the river and I have never laughed and had so much fun! We had such a great time we stayed an extra day to do the Challenge rafting trip with "Buffalo" as our guide who made it a phenomenal trip! We will all be back!

name: totsy johnson
text: Husband got scratch up and bleed a little .other than that it was good too short of trip

name: Paul Ligget
text: Fun trip down the river without having to go out of town

name: Ja Behrend
text: Best rafting I've done in the south.

name: Melissa M
text: My husband and I had a terrific day on the river. Our guide, Russell was a lot of fun. Thanks for helping us celebrate our 18th anniversary. We had a blast!

name: Tiffany Murray
text: Love this place

name: Nikki Snead
text: Just called to inquire about kayak rentals.  The girl that answered was rude and chewing on food while trying to talk.  she was not helpful at all.  i will never use them!!! call Outdoor world ...they were pleasant and very helpful!!!

name: Garrett Blackmon
text: This trip was a blast! Our guide was awesome (pretty sure all the guides are) and we really got to see some action! Definitely go if you haven't!

name: Alan Witort
text: Great time once the water rose.

name: Vinod Potty
text: Rafting and Zipline are awesome. Staff are friendly and polite.  Blue heron is not worth the time or money. One particular staff locked the Zipline wrong, twice.

name: John Franklin
text: This is a great family trip. We came and did the white water rafting one day, then the zip line and tree course the next day. Downtown Columbus makes for a great trip.

name: Robbie Bailes
text: Mateo was a great guide and the experience was phenomenal.

name: Sarah Briggs
text: Syd is thw best tour guide around! It was such a blast and a great workout as well! Be prepared to get soaked!

name: Jaque Landers
text: Visited here June 10, 2017 w/ my family for my Father's bday! We had an AWESOME experience....our raft instructors were GREAT. I will be booking again soon! Ready to see the pictures and video. I will recommend this to EVERYONE!!

name: Derek Briggs
text: Overall, the rafting was great! We chose the Classic trip, but if we went back again we would try out the Carnage trip. The low water was fun, but we felt that higher water levels with the Carnage option would be even better. Our guide (Joseph) was great too!

name: Chickens Xylophone
text:
Absolutely beautiful,  Matteo was a great guide, full of historical knowledge and funny at the same time.
We had a wonderful adventure  *****

name: Ken Lynch
text: My self and my youngest stepson went on the classic today and had a wonderful time. The staff was wonderful and our guide was amazing his name was Carson and I am very much looking forward to coming back next weekend with my oldest step son to do the more challenging rapids. If Carson is available I will definitely be seeing about getting him again next weekend. I will say that the only downfall was the other people in the boat who didn't seem to fallow directions well. Not sure if they couldn't hear him or just were not used to these kinds of activities. That being said I recommend trying to go in a group  that works well together if you don't have much patients. It was not something that made or broke my experience but I am a bit more understanding then some. If your thinking of going go with an open mind and just have fun.

name: Jess Smith
text: Fantastic time, our guides (Trevor and Garrett) took us through every obstacle and helped us figure out the best way to go through it all. It was a good time to go as well as it wasn't too hot.

name: Christopher Everett
text: Doc was the guide assigned to our group and made the experience more enjoyable with his banter and knowledge of the river and surrounding area. Recommend you ask for him.

name: Reynolds Cheney
text: Fantastic trip today. The guides are very good and know what they are doing. A great way to spend your day in downtown Columbus, GA

name: Aram Mergian Jr
text: I went on the white water rafting trip and it was such a huge disappointment. There were about 6 spots during the whole trip where there was white water and it was very brief. The rest of it was just calm, slow going river water. The guides talk to you the whole time cracking jokes and engaging in conversation with you to make the trip more interesting and less awkward. They're really a great group of people. I will say that some of them can be quite crude. The only thing I can say is that I wish there were more and better rapids.

name: BigRed CacheMachine
text: If you've got a highly excitable newbie who could go on only the mildest of raft trips, do NOT set foot in the store.  Video on loop shows an indistinguishable mashup from mild to extreme which will end your chances...of course by then, they have your money and you'll be trip-less.

name: Duane Moore
text: These guys are awesome.  Had everything needed for an amazing white water rafting trip. Marcus is an excellent guide.  His Instagram is whitewater_droppa... check him out.

name: Midlife Crisis
text: Great fun. Kids loved it. Somewhat short, but a great time had

name: Zack Burdeshaw
text: We had an amazing time. We can't wait to go back. Ian was our guide and he was awesome. We did the challenge trip.

name: R Alvarez
text: My family had a blast rafting at whitewater express.  We did the Classic.  Our guide, Kujo was beyond dynamic.  My son who is 9 yrs old was very scared before the trip and very nervous but Kujo made sure he was accommodated, safe and happy. By the end of the trip, my son was joking, smiling and acting as co-guide all because Kujo. Everyone on the raft except for myself was first timers and he made sure everyone had the best experience ever.  Also, honorable mention goes to the other guide Froto. He was very helpful to my husband when he got stuck at the lazy river.  I'll definitely be back as all yhe staff was wonderful.

name: Abraham Deleon
text: Great place for rafting friendly staff

name: Denise Vogelgesang
text: Great time! Shout out to Jordan - great guide!!!!

name: Ryan McCann
text: Great water on the Challenge course. When they open the dam it really pours. Definitely recommend it for those wanting a real white water experience. Our guide Colby was great. We made it through all the rapids smoothly and tried surfing one for a second time. We flipped the boat, but Colby's instructions at each point allowed us to recover the boat and keep on rafting. We were one of several boats that acted as safety boats beyond the class 5 rapids. We learned a lot and had a great time picking up others that had been tossed out. Definitely a family event we would do again.

name: Joshua Newbend
text: The staff is always helpful and I would definitely recommend the rafting course! Also if you take the kayaking class, they are very understanding and VERY good at teaching you the right way to do things! Plus, the zipline is way worth it!

name: Luciano Batista
text: Yesterday was an amazing experience! We found them on Groupon and when I called to ask some questions the lady who answered was extremely helpful and patient with all of my concerns. My wife and I decided to do the Challenge Rafting Trip because we wanted the most adventurous ride. Our guide was Seth aka “Monday” and even though he mentioned he was a rookie, we felt very comfortable and safe throughout. Being a Firefighter/EMT I’m always concerned about safety and I’ve taken a couple of water rescue operations class and I know how powerful the rapids water can be. We had six people total plus Seth and from the beginning a guy sitting in the front named Dean seemed to have also wanted a more challenging ride after he had previously done the Classic Trip. Dean even asked to sit in the front, and made me think “that’s my type of guy and we will have fun with this fella in the front”. I was so wrong. Dean couldn’t paddle for s@h#%! Our guide would ask for only 3 paddles but Dean would keep going like he knew better, he was extremely annoying and inconsiderate to the rest of the group. Seth kept the trip alive with his witty jokes and history telling. The rapids did not disappoint us, and they were very similar to the James River located in Richmond, VA where we are from. Once we got to the Class V rapids we all braced to the bottom of the boat but the flip was inevitable specially having Dean upfront doing his own thing. I think we all drank some Chattahoochee River Cocktail, regardless it was a lot of fun and everyone wanted to do it again except Dean, of course. Seth told us we wouldn’t do it again to please him but to our surprise Dean ended up jumping off to the side walk and leaving us to have all the fun. If you are in Columbus area, I highly recommend these guys and the services they provide. Just wish there were better photos of our trip, maybe all the guides should carry a GoPro and I would definitely spend the extra money for some cool pictures.

name: synda14
text: Went on for our first White River experience and Gator our guide was awesome. Very personable and very funny, we had a blast and would recommend Whitewater Express to everyone! We were visiting from Florida

name: Patricia Norwood
text: I did just the zip line couple months ago and loved it.  Took my grandson with me and this time did the full adventure! AWESOME!!!! This grandma kept up with her 15 year old grandson!  WooHoo

name: Michael Taylor
text: In one word, WOW!!! Great time! We did the Challenge trip and believe me, it will give you one h@// of a ride! Our guide, Harris, is a madman! If you want some whitewater fun and excitement, call'em up and hit the water. Thanks to Whitewater Express and the folks that make it a great experience.

name: Kaley
text: This was an incredible experience, My husband and I went on a weekend trip here and we did the Carnage trip and we loved it so much! I would highly recommend Whitewater Express, Our guide Ian was very funny and made our trip very enjoyable.

name: ERICA L-P
text: Great experience. Wish i would have bought the add ons. My kids had a great time.

name: Zoom 173
text: Prepare to work out because the whole experience is fun and exciting

name: Candy Caughey
text: Cold Feet was a great guide. Had a terrific time on the water. Located in a terrific area. Reasonably priced.

name: Kiara Harvey
text: After a few runs up on the Ocoee, I thought I had seen it all and that I was invincible. This outpost was by far the wildest within driving distance of Atlanta, and maximum thrills are all but guaranteed on the Challenge Trip. I was tossed from a raft for the first time - twice in one run - thanks to Cutbait. Two thumbs way up for our River Guide, Bacon, for his epic rescues and local area knowledge.

name: Antainette Spivey
text: Didn't visit white water. Was at clean the hooch. But I'm sure rafting would be fun.

name: Ryan Slaton
text: So fun! Our tour guide was amazing. I think his name was something like Skeaver?? The guy with the Walmart cactus shorts. 100% want to go again and do the more intense rapids.

name: Sean Abel
text: Awesome zipline fun! Would love to do it again and they have some really cool full day experiences! Cool place with cute staff!! The girls were smoking hot!

name: Penny Billington
text: Amazing zip line experience!! Friendly, knowledgeable guides with a great sense of humor! Thank you for the trip!

name: Drew Peterson
text: Went for my daughters 18th birthday and it turned out to be a blast. Our raft guide was Skillet.  We would request him again in a heartbeat.

name: Steven Price
text: We loved the zipline experience. Very fun and exciting and worth every dime. The staff was also great, very helpful and friendly.

name: Gilberto Mendoza
text: Awesome! Best guide "Big Mike"

name: Daniel Curran
text: Zipped from Georgia to Alabama. It was awesome!

name: Rashelle Lott
text: Such a great experience!!! Loved this!! Guide was amazing historic education with a thrill. My 9 year old 70 pound daughter had a blast!!!

name: Fred Simmler
text: Rating, zip lining, ropes course, and bike rentals.  We have done all of them and this group is very fun but professional too.  Best place in town to go.

name: Joshua Kirk
text: Great guides, a smooth river with well spaced man made rapids. Their prices are good, the equipment is in good shape. Lots of fun!

name: Kelly McNamara
text:
Had a wonderful trip down the Chattahoochee with Carson as our guide on the Carnage raft! He was super knowledgeable, friendly, and really encouraged us to get the most out of our trip. We rode the rapids multiple times and really took advantage of the perks of the Carnage trip.

The difference of the Carnage versus the challenge is you're in a 5 person raft (best with only 3 guests and a guide , so 4 total) instead of a 7 person  raft and you get to do more things in the rapids, like go more often through them and also surf them on purpose. You can also jump from the Rock cliffs that help form Cut Bait Rapid and swim the rapid.

If you want to have a great adventure, go Carnage, but please only if you can swim. And I would recommend Carson as your guide, however all of them seemed knowledgeable.

name: Barney Davis
text: An absolute blast. Guides were a lot of fun. You will get wet so be ready to go into the water. Highly recommended.

name: Jennifer Mewhiney
text: Fantastic!!! And our guide Rich - aka Adam Sandler made it even more fun! Definitely coming back!

name: Rodney Ferry
text: Awesome day rafting.  Our guide Frodo was great very knowledgeable and he brought us all home.  Thanks Frodo we will definitely be back and thanks for the frozen yogurt suggestion.

name: Mark Anderson
text: This experience has the only class 5 rapid in the southeast during late afternoon times. 90 percent chance of wipe out; I thought I was going to drown. Very fun.

name: Will Miranda
text: I LOVED IT !!! 😀😀 Love to do it again....

name: Michael Bires
text: Dos. Is an awesome guide.

name: Roger Miller
text: It was GREAT!!! I'm 51 years old and have always wanted to go rafting. This was my first time and I'd go back EVERY day !!!!  Rachel was an awesome guide also.

name: Craig Maness
text: Be back next year they also have a zipline

name: Cassidy Smith
text:
This is a great experience!!!
I totally recommend going rafting I did not do the zip line though.
Plus I have a funny story
The guide said I don't understand when people fall out on the beginner course. And then he fell out on the first rapid. All the other people stayed in the raft though. Lol 😂😂😂

name: Jennifer Young
text: Awesome fun options. We did the zip line. Well worth the $30 per person. Loved it

name: Wyatt Liles
text: Amazing trip! I went on the challenge course and was not disappointed. Well worth the money.

name: Michael Lynch
text: Great staff, outdoors selection and entertainment. Rafting and zip line are worth it, high water is much better than low.

name: David White
text: Nice medium level river with great , "big water". Lazy river was unusual and nice to cool off in. Looks like Columbus is doing a lot to improve city and rafting.

name: Janeen Small
text: Awesome guides!! Great experience

name: charles
text: Great fun! Guides were kind and generous. Overall, just a great place to be! 10 out of 10 would recommend!

name: Ron Cochran
text: Good experience, good price, the raft leader was fun

name: Tatiyana Brown
text: Its great it's a splash pad there for kids there is fishing there is everything they white water rafting sometimes good trucks are out the good is great has a playground for the kids it's everything so get out there and have fun

name: Mandy Braswell
text: A bit over crowded.  But seemed like a nice place

name: Terri Stone
text: There was no way to drift down that river in tubes the current wasnt strong enough. Over priced

name: matthew willits
text: Awesome experience all the tour guides were awesome, I had Carson great dude!!

name: Amber Launstein
text: The splash pad is right across the street. The kids love it. Plus the view of the river is awesome from here too

name: Maria Sola
text: Pure clean fun!

name: Darlen Saget
text: The best!

name: Todd Davidson
text: Jordan was our guide. He did a great job as well as a little history of the area. Great time. Highly recommended if in columbus.

name: Janeen Small
text: Awesome guides!! Great experience

name: Charles Miller
text: Great adventure! The guide was awesome! They will flip you on purpose so be prepared while rafting! Lol! Awesome Fun

name: D' Latte
text: I drove in from Louisiana for the high flow challenge with my nephews from France. The power company didn't release the water and we ended up with low flow.  Since the river was at low flow the staff offered us half off our next trip to Whitewater Express.The guide offered us to ride in the duckies ,which are inflatable kayaks. We had a blast in low flow riding the duckies. We went back 1week later without the half off coupon and the staff pulled up our info on computor and honored the half off price. We were very fortunate to have Ian for a guide.If you want the wildest trip ever on the river? Go during high flow and ask for Ian as your guide. He is very knowledgeable and skilled.You can look up flow schedule from Georgia power company, North Highlands dam.

name: Catherine Jackson
text: Guide was fun and entertaining. Had a blast, will be going back

name: Mandy Braswell
text: A bit over crowded.  But seemed like a nice place

name: Michael Bires
text: Dos. Is an awesome guide.

name: matthew willits
text: Awesome experience all the tour guides were awesome, I had Carson great dude!!

name: Terri Stone
text: There was no way to drift down that river in tubes the current wasnt strong enough. Over priced

name: John Clarke
text: Great. Will do it again.  Top notch organization.

name: Craig Maness
text: Be back next year they also have a zipline

name: MrSpate6
text: Had a great time!!  The staff was professional and enthusiastic about everyone having a great experience, very knowledgeable about and conscientious, wonderful!!!

name: John W
text: Amazing. Ian is the best tour guide, I have ever been under. The experience of white water rafting was genuinely a thrilling, challenging and unforgettable experience.

name: Kirsten Miller
text: Matateo was the best tour guide! We had a blast and worth it!

name: Michelle Cole
text: Great outing with my family. We really enjoyed the ziplining over the Chatahoochee River. The rafting was ok. It was a lot of smooth sailing and 3 Rapids but a good adventure for beginners.

name: Mule Skinner
text: Will was excellent to work with. His staff gave our group a excellent trip!!

name: ssus5151
text: Did the zip line adventure, description offers more than what is actually open. Drove 4 hours from Savannah to find out the we ONLY get to ride TWO zip lines and walk through TWO obstacle courses. To top it off - the "boat ride" is a bus ride and the bus LEFT HALF OF THE PAYING CUSTOMERS ACROSS THE RIVER IN ALABAMA. One of the employees just so happened to be stranded with us (thank god for her) and had to call to figure out what was taking so long. Then come to find out - the OWNER of this establishment KNEW about us being left in the heat without any access to water and had the AUDACITY to say that "it was not his problem" and that the employees "needed to figure it out." Not to mention it's the middle of the day, there is no access to water, and we were told we were not allowed to walk because it's a "liability" problem. I am in pure shock and disappointment - we were offered no compensation other than free pictures.

name: Joseph Mcgauthiar
text: Awesome time rafting in Columbus, Ga. Whitewater Express staff is friendly, energetic and experienced rafters.

name: Tammy Norris
text: Had a lot of fun. Looking at getting season passes since we are local.

name: Faridah Thomas
text: I enjoyed my experience

name: Richard Munguia

name: ssus5151
text: Did the zip line adventure, description offers more than what is actually open. Drove 4 hours from Savannah to find out the we ONLY get to ride TWO zip lines and walk through TWO obstacle courses. To top it off - the "boat ride" is a bus ride and the bus LEFT HALF OF THE PAYING CUSTOMERS ACROSS THE RIVER IN ALABAMA. One of the employees just so happened to be stranded with us (thank god for her) and had to call to figure out what was taking so long. Then come to find out - the OWNER of this establishment KNEW about us being left in the heat without any access to water and had the AUDACITY to say that "it was not his problem" and that the employees "needed to figure it out." Not to mention it's the middle of the day, there is no access to water, and we were told we were not allowed to walk because it's a "liability" problem. I am in pure shock and disappointment - we were offered no compensation other than free pictures.

name: Cassie Head
text:
My husband, my 7 year old son, and I did the classic river rafting and blue Herron challenge today. While the weather was hot and miserable this afternoon, we all agreed it was blast, and we will definitely come back when the weather is cooler.

Our river guide was Gator, who was fun, knowledgeable about the history of Columbus, as well the local wild life. We are not sure if you can request a guide, but if you can, we will be asking for him again.

The zip line was amazing! The obstical course was very challenging, and while my 7 year old didn't do all of out (short legs) the accomplishment boosted his confidence.

We highly recommend this facility and trip of you are looking for a day adventure.

name: Ali Orr
text:
We did the zip line express canopy tour, and were pretty disappointed.
-Groupon- we were charged $12 in fees when we arrived in addition to the groupon we already paid for. It would be so easy to put this info on the Groupon just so that we would know ahead of time. Instead, not providing full disclosure prices and fees was deceitful and irritating.
-the ranger jump- 60 foot drop, it's basically just an auto belay used for climbing. The drop is very slow. Auto-belays are not meant for this use, so it will eventually give out hopefully not when someone is on it.
-the high ropes obstacles- boring! It was basically just a variety of bridges to walk across, there was no challenge. Also, the cables that you clip into were too low, constantly in the way.
-30 min wait- they were understaffed so we had to wait for 30 minutes to go back to the other side on the zip line to complete the course. We had good conversation with other couples, but this was extremely annoying.
-unlimited- The pass that we had was for unlimited use in the afternoon. We didn't want to do the high ropes obstacles again, we just wanted to zip line across the river again. But there was no one available to follow through on the unlimited portion of our pass. It was total BS.

name: Chris Jarrett
text: Mild rapids are perfect for younger rafters or first-timers, and whitewater through Columbus is pretty cool. I'd say it's worth the price if it's your first time, otherwise I'd look for an adventure elsewhere. The zip lines are pretty overpriced. You're allowed to go through multiple times but you don't really feel like it by the time you're done. Unless you have a Groupon or you've never ziplined before, I don't recommend it. All in all its a good establishment that brings a lot to Columbus, but much more in the "safe family fun" genre than "intense outdoor adventure". It's just really pricy for families.
